abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils won in Chicago, 3-2, for their second victory over the Blackhawks in a week.

headline.main: Devils Get Second Win in a Week Against the Blackhawks
headline.print_headline: Devils Get Second Win in a Week Against the Blackhawks

snippet: The Devils won in Chicago, 3-2, for their second victory over the Blackhawks in a week.
